title: Eileen Paige: Confession #1
description: The beginning of Hollywood secrets spilled.  When Laney, a young Portland divorcee, searches in vain for her keys after a wet night out with the girls, her helpful neighbor steps up to ensure that she makes it to bed safely. The morning after, he invites her to join him for a relaxed Thanksgiving dinner. At the thought of facing her first holiday alone, Laney finds herself ringing his doorbell for a fun family evening. Among the friendly new faces who welcome Laney is her neighbor's step-sister, the famous Hollywood film actress, Eileen Paige.  The first confession of E.C. Towers' new Starfucker: Erotic Shorts Series explores an unexpected love triangle that emerges one cold November night.
author: E.C. Towers
